title: The Line Is Dead
description: Ray Curtis is an investigator for a Grand Rapids law firm when he decides to make a career change. With his US Coast Guard background, he finds a new home with the Alabama Marine Police on Lake Gibson, where a murder has taken place on one of the islands. Ray continues his own investigation, despite being warned to stay out of the way by the local Sheriff. Rayâ€™s resolve follows several leads including a trip to Galway, Ireland where he finds the story is more complicated than one can imagine.
author: R.J. Crawley
